com.cipherlibrary

Interface Encryptable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AffineEncryptor, AtBashEncryptor, CaesarEncryptor, Encryptor, RailFenceEncryptor, Rot13Encryptor, Rot47Encryptor, VigenereEncrytpor

    public interface Encryptable
    Interface providing methods controlling all of the Encryptor classes.
    See Also:
    Encryptor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String input)
      Method used to decrypt given input text using a cipher implemented by calling Encryptor class.
      java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String input)
      Method used to encrypt given input text using a cipher implemented by calling Encryptor class.
      CipherMode getMode()
      Retrieves mode used in encryption and decryption process.
      void setMode(CipherMode mode)
      Sets the encryption mode used during encryption and decryption

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String input)
        Method used to encrypt given input text using a cipher implemented by calling Encryptor class.
        Parameters:
        input - Text to encrypt.
        Returns:
        Encrypted text as String.
        See Also:
        Encryptor

      • decrypt

        java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String input)
        Method used to decrypt given input text using a cipher implemented by calling Encryptor class.
        Parameters:
        input - Text to decrypt.
        Returns:
        Decrypted text as String.
        See Also:
        Encryptor

      • setMode

        void setMode(CipherMode mode)
        Sets the encryption mode used during encryption and decryption
        Parameters:
        mode - Mode used in encryption.
        See Also:
        CipherMode

      • getMode

        CipherMode getMode()
        Retrieves mode used in encryption and decryption process.
        Returns:
        CipherMode, mode used in encryption
        See Also:
        CipherMode
